sqlMap.select: select ATTR_ID, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_DESC, ATTR_TYPE, ATTR_LEN, SEQ_NUM from T02_DATA_ATTR where 1=1 and ATTR_NAME like '%'||#attrName#||'%' and ATTR_DESC like '%'||#attrDesc#||'%' order by SEQ_NUM
sqlMap.insert: insert into T02_DATA_ATTR (ATTR_ID, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_DESC, ATTR_TYPE, ATTR_LEN, SEQ_NUM) VALUES ('$attrId$', '$attrName$', '$attrDesc$', '$attrType$', '$attrLen$', '$seqNum$')
sqlMap.update: update T02_DATA_ATTR set ATTR_NAME='$attrName$', ATTR_DESC='$attrDesc$', ATTR_TYPE='$attrType$', ATTR_LEN='$attrLen$', SEQ_NUM='$seqNum$' where ATTR_ID='$attrId$'
